item.description:
Hello everyone!! I hope you all have had a wonderful Holiday Season. I'd like to wish each and every one of you and your fur babies a Happy New Year!!

We're going to get back on track here with the meet ups. Velvet and I have missed all of you.

We'll have our January meet up on Sunday 1/23 from 11am - 1pm. Those who will be attending for the first time, please check in at the front desk and be sure to bring proof of vaccines for the rabies, distemper and canine cough.

As always, if anyone would like to schedule a grooming for after the meetup, please let me know.

January will also bring a new series of training classes.

Looking forward to seeing you all again!

Agni
item.name: JANUARY MEET UP
